title: Resurrect Zombie (beta)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Resurrect Zombie is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires level 76 Magic to be cast, in addition to having six prayer points. The spell was available to test during the Arceuus Spellbook Beta.

content:
Resurrect Zombie is a temporary piece of content found only in unrestricted worlds.
The contents of this page refer to a piece of content only available on temporary unrestricted worlds as a means to test it before release.
Its design is subject to change, and the graphics are used as a placeholder.
Resurrect Zombie
Released 28 April 2021 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 76
Spellbook Arceuus
Type Combat
Experience 88
Runes 10 5 1
Casting speed 50 ticks
Quest A Kingdom Divided
Description Unknown (edit)
Animation
Sound Effect
Please add a sound effect!

Resurrect Zombie is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires level 76 Magic to be cast, in addition to having six prayer points. The spell was available to test during the Arceuus Spellbook Beta.

The spell will summon a zombie thrall, which has an attack speed of 4 (attacking every 2.4 seconds) and attacks using Melee (with a max hit of 3), ignoring any accuracy checks in the process. They will attack the same target that the player is attacking, and cannot be damaged. However, they cannot attack other players.

Zombie thralls will remain for a set amount of time ( 0.6 ∗ M a g i c L e v e l {\displaystyle 0.6*MagicLevel} seconds), but players can cast resurrection spells again after 30 seconds, albeit the existing thrall will disappear if players do so.

After feedback from the beta, the spell was polled in Phosani's Nightmare Poll to have three tiers instead of one, resulting in the release of the spells Resurrect Lesser Zombie, Resurrect Superior Zombie, and Resurrect Greater Zombie.

'''Resurrect Zombie''' is a spell within the [[Arceuus spellbook]] that requires level 76 [[Magic]] to be cast, in addition to having six [[prayer points]]. The spell was available to test during the [[Unrestricted_world#Arceuus_Spellbook_Beta|Arceuus Spellbook Beta]].

The spell will summon a [[Zombie Thrall (beta)|zombie thrall]], which has an [[attack speed]] of 4 (attacking every 2.4 seconds) and attacks using [[Melee]] (with a max hit of 3), ignoring any accuracy checks in the process. They will attack the same target that the player is attacking, and cannot be damaged. However, they '''cannot''' attack other players.

Zombie thralls will remain for a set amount of time (<math>0.6 * MagicLevel</math> seconds), but players can cast resurrection spells again after 30 seconds, albeit the existing thrall will disappear if players do so.

After feedback from the beta, the spell was polled in [[Poll:Phosani's Nightmare Poll|Phosani's Nightmare Poll]] to have three tiers instead of one, resulting in the release of the spells [[Resurrect Lesser Zombie]], [[Resurrect Superior Zombie]], and [[Resurrect Greater Zombie]].
